name: Two Coffers on Stands
description: Two Coffers on Stands; Attributed to André-Charles Boulle (French, 1642 - 1732, master before 1666); Paris, France; about 1684 - 1689; Oak, cypress, and walnut veneered with tortoise shell, blue-painted horn, ebony, padouk, rosewood, pewter, and brass; gilt-bronze mounts; mirror glass; 82.DA.109; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
